Nightstrike::

"If Megatron use his blaster against us... THAT WILL BE YOU FAULT!!!" 
Thought Nightstrike after that he opened his comm link to 
Megatron "Nightsrike to Megatron... Firestrike and I suspect that an 
unknow enemy is around the base... we'll back to the area and check 
it"

> ::FireStrike::
> "Hey, NightStrike. LEt's head back. I got a killing feeling that 
the

transport.
